title: Under My Bed
subtle: Concept (fiction), 47 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR90L
description: Where can lost things usually be found? Under a bed, of course! In Under My Bed, a girl finds many things she needs beneath her bed, such as a sock, a hat, and a cat! Detailed illustrations, patterned text, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to connect to prior knowledge as well as to identify characters and setting.
reviewWords: bat, bed, block, book, sock, under
comprehension: Identify Characters and Setting                : Identify characters and setting in a text
awareness: Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word under
